description:
This course is designed to challenge preservice teachers to use their knowledge, expertise and experience to design learning environments that will engage students in the learning process and cater for a variety of learning styles. This includes the application of principles and methods of curriculum development, implementation and assessment of agriculture; preparing curriculum materials and their rationales; observations of teaching.

This course may not be offered if the enrolment is less than 10 students.
prerequisites: Entry to the Graduate Diploma of Education (Secondary) or entry to Bachelor of Education (Secondary) (Dual degree) professional year.
